attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The behaviour of MP's falsely claiming expenses has resulted in a loss of trust with the people of this country.
In doing so they have broken their contract to represent their constituents in a honourable manner.
We demand the opportunity to replace the existing parliamentary members with others who we can place our trust in.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
